type_2.title: First 5 clickers get 300 coins
type_2.desc_google: [user_name] got five in a row and won [num] Coins on Slotomania. [user_name] is playing Slotomania for Android.
type_2.desc_amazon: [user_name] got five in a row and won [num] Coins on Slotomania. [user_name] is playing Slotomania for Amazon.
type_2.user_msg: Slotomania Rewards VIP Club members get even more Coins!

level_up.title: First 5 clickers get 500 coins
level_up.desc_google: [user_name] just went up to level [level] on Slotomania and got [num] coins. Way to go!
level_up.desc_amazon: [user_name] just went up to level [level] on Slotomania and got [num] coins. Way to go!
level_up.user_msg: Slotomania Rewards VIP Club members get even more Coins!

mega_bonus.title: First 3 clickers get 200 coins
mega_bonus.desc: [user_name] is sharing the luck after getting a Mega Bonus of [num] Slotomania coins.
mega_bonus.user_msg: Slotomania Rewards VIP Club members get even more Coins!

mini_bonus_game.title: First 3 clickers get 300 coins
mini_bonus_game.desc: [user_name] is sharing the luck after winning [num] Slotomania coins in the [machine_name] slot game.
mini_bonus_game.user_msg: Slotomania Rewards VIP Club members get even more Coins!

bonus_game.title: First 5 clickers get 200 coins
bonus_game.desc: [user_name] is sharing the luck after winning [num] Slotomania Coins in the [machine_name] bonus round.
bonus_game.user_msg: Slotomania Rewards VIP Club members get even more Coins!

standalonewarn.title: Unconnected
standalonewarn.message: You have selected to play in unconnected mode. This will result in friends features to be disabled. Are you sure you want to proceed?

update.title: Update is available
update.message: The new version of [GAME] is available, would you like to update it ([SIZE]MB download)?

download.title: Download Required
download.message: The game you selected requires downloading a [SIZE] MB file. It is recommended to switch to a Wi-Fi connection. Download anyway?

outdated.message: Please update Slotomania before starting [GAME], open Android market?

downloading.title: Downloading Game
downloading.message: The game you selected is being downloaded. Meanwhile you can play other available games. [PROGRESS]% downloaded

in_queue.message: The game you selected will start downloading shortly. Meanwhile you can play other available games.

respin.title: Free fall rescue!
